last_episode_to_air.name: The End
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kate searches for the magic; Anne learns to let go; Sloane honors her priorities; Jenny course corrects; Val makes amends.

name: Workin' Moms
overview: Four women juggle love, careers, and parenthood. They support, challenge, and try not to judge each other as life throws them curveballs. Whether it is an identity crisis, a huge job opportunity, postpartum depression, or an unplanned pregnancy – they face both the good and bad with grace and humour.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Kate grapples with the unexpected addition to the Foster family, as a snag threatens to unravel everything she’s built at work. Anne finds out that you can move the girl back to the city, but her small town problems can’t be left behind. Jenny comes to realize that interoffice relationships might be a little messier than expected. Powerhouse Sloane is back again, and killing it in the boardroom, but maybe there’s more room in her schedule for a personal life than she thought. Val’s considering real change for the first time in a long time.

episodes.name: Bare
episodes.overview: Kate enthusiastically returns to work following her maternity leave and is faced with the ultimate challenge: Can she "have it all?" Anne gets shocking news, and Frankie experiences postpartum depression in her unique Frankie way.

episodes.name: Rules
episodes.overview: Determined to have it all, Kate tries to do it all and ends up leaving her husband in the lurch. Anne is fed up with her provocative daughter, and Jenny's return to work gives way to a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: Fem Card
episodes.overview: Kate learns a lesson about being vulnerable when Frankie needs her help. Anne tries tough love with her daughter, and Jenny plays dumb at work in an attempt to get what she wants.

episodes.name: The Wolf & The Rabbit
episodes.overview: Kate is shamed for the porn she watches as she educates the mommies on hentai.

episodes.name: Hoop Earring
episodes.overview: Eleanor is tasked with helping Kate find a new Nanny, with surprising results. Jenny organizes a last-minute bachelorette party for a coworker she barely knows. And Frankie and Giselle crack their intimacy issue... with a little help from a friend.

episodes.name: Tricky Nipple
episodes.overview: Nathan is less than thrilled to hear about Kate's Montreal promotion. Anne makes some profound realizations after a stress-related injury. Jenny faces the aftermath of her night of debauchery with the girls.

episodes.name: The Coxswain
episodes.overview: Kate overcompensates for her upcoming time away from her family. Anne tries to bond with Alice on Alice's level, and Frankie's crosses a boundary with a homebuyer.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Kate
episodes.overview: Kate helps Anne on a reconnaissance mission. Jenny reaches the limits of her self-exploration, and Frankie enters a new work/home reality.

episodes.name: Merde
episodes.overview: Kate feels the inevitable cost of "having it all". Anne, with Lionel's support, makes a huge decision for her family. Jenny tries to return to her old life, while Frankie tries to throw hers away.

episodes.name: Having It All
episodes.overview: Kate undertakes the ultimate working-mom test; Jenny is forced to admit what it is she really wants; Alice's school project unites Anne's family; and Frankie tries to fix the unfixable.
The year is 2005 and a young ambitious Kate attends her best friend Anne's wedding, but encounters situations that could change the course of their lives forever.

episodes.name: Good Mom
episodes.overview: Kate is fed up and sets out to get her job back; Lionel is convinced to get a vasectomy; Frankie thrives at the center.

episodes.name: The Sign
episodes.overview: Kate mourns a family member; Anne and Lionel explore their newfound sex life; Frankie realizes she must leave the Wellness Center; Ian has a positive meeting.

episodes.name: The Holy Hole
episodes.overview: Kate tries to balance two jobs; Anne moves into a new office space; Frankie meets two different women in the same day.

episodes.name: Consent
episodes.overview: Kate steps outside her comfort zone in an attempt to keep up at Baseline, and receives a surprise phone call from Gaze. Anne agrees to hypnotherapy with Brad.

episodes.name: Shame Spiral
episodes.overview: Kate's irresponsible actions have unexpected consequences at work. Stressed about problems at home, Anne's frustration with Kate comes to a head. Frankie has another encounter with Juniper.

episodes.name: Retreat
episodes.overview: The members of Val's Toddler Time go on a weekend retreat and learn surprising truths about love, friendship and the one mother everyone thought was perfect.

episodes.name: Red Handed
episodes.overview: Kate struggles with working for two different firms; Anne deals with Alice's first boyfriend; Ian confronts Jenny; Frankie tries to juggle two different women.

episodes.name: Spirit Animal
episodes.overview: Kate helps Alice through an important milestone; Brad pressures Anne to face her fear; Sonia's discomfort with Zoe upsets Ian; Frankie makes some romantic decisions.

episodes.name: Cuck
episodes.overview: Kate considers starting a business; Anne becomes friends with an overzealous fan; Sonia and Ian have a discussion; Frankie finds new roommates.

episodes.name: Trash Panda
episodes.overview: Kate's new career and family plans become jeopardized when she has a health scare; Anne and Lionel uncover truths about their marriage; Frankie gets back to work.

episodes.name: If Women Had to Give Birth
episodes.overview: While trying to hide her health problems, Kate hires help to launch her new endeavour; Anne tries to make things right with Lionel, permanently; Frankie hosts a family dinner in her new home; an emergency interrupts Ian's meeting.

episodes.name: Look Back
episodes.overview: Everyone gathers together to celebrate Anne and Lionel's commitment ceremony and one guest makes a discovery.

episodes.name: Birth Daze
episodes.overview: In the wake of Nathan's infidelity, Kate gets her life back on track with a new apartment, a new business and a new baby.

episodes.name: Of Rights And Men
episodes.overview: Kate forges a dubious but profitable new business relationship. Disappointed by a court decision, Anne takes matters into her own hands, and channels her rage into a good cause. An old friend tracks down newly rich Frankie with a request.

episodes.name: Daddy's Home
episodes.overview: Kate represents an offensive client. Forrest's attempts at being alone with Kate fail. Anne's new job presses her buttons. Frankie plays financier; Jenny makes new friends.

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.overview: While pursuing new business, Kate confronts an old foe; when Alice decides she's ready to use the subway alone, Anne takes anti-pervert training into overdrive; Frankie finds out Bianca has big life plans and decides to help.

episodes.name: Stand for Something
episodes.overview: Kate finds herself in trouble following some bad press; Anne fears for Alice's safety; Jenny finds herself a hero.

episodes.name: Narls In Charge
episodes.overview: The Headmaster at Charlie's school assigns Kate with a humiliating task. Lionel presents Anne with an innovative solution to overcome her misplaced aggression. Bad news from Bianca sets Frankie on a path to Juniper, in search of a solution.

episodes.name: Revenge Fantasy
episodes.overview: While Kate takes her work to the streets, Jenny lashes out on the job, Anne incites violence, Alice gets revenge and tensions boil over in Val's home.

episodes.name: Girl's Trip
episodes.overview: When Kate, Anne, Frankie and Val take a memorable “trip” to celebrate Frankie's birthday, secrets are revealed and friendships are tested.

episodes.name: Guns ‘n’ Deception
episodes.overview: Kate shoots from the hip when Steve Malk suggests a new client. While Forrest is filled with heartache, things heat up between Kate and Mike. Meanwhile, Frankie is in heaven, Anne channels Dirty Harry and when trouble occurs at Tech-cellent, Jenny bends the rules like a boss.

episodes.name: Creamed
episodes.overview: Kate is hit with a lawsuit while Anne and Lionel struggle to keep up with Alice's exploits. Frankie feels the weight of being in love with a religious woman.

episodes.name: Business Boyz
episodes.overview: As Kate is served with an ultimatum, Anne attempts to resolve a conflict with Brenna's parents. Jenny’s gamble at work backfires, resulting in the personal and the professional intertwining. Val has a potential new suitor!

episodes.name: Two Paths
episodes.overview: Kate heads to New York for a client pitch. Meanwhile in Toronto, Alice makes a desperate choice based on Anne’s recent actions and Frankie finds herself in the middle of an intensifying family conflict.

episodes.name: What's It Gonna Be?
episodes.overview: Kate finds herself at a fork in the road. Anne realizes the truth about Alice. Ian guides Jenny to the light, while Val quantum leaps into love.

episodes.name: Charade
episodes.overview: Kate faces judgment from her friends over her decision, and clashes with Mike over the Tru Air account. Anne handles a rebellious Alice with creative discipline, and Frankie and Bianca navigate new waters.

episodes.name: Black Sheep
episodes.overview: Alice's new internship at Kate Foster PR drains Kate's resources the day of a client event, while Lionel's attempt at teaching his daughter the meaning of responsibility, backfires. Frankie makes a decision Bianca may not be ready for.

episodes.name: The Man in the Mexican Mask
episodes.overview: Kate wonders whether Mike is friend or foe. Anne and Nathan face off at the kids' day camp. Jenny discovers a dark secret at Tech-cellent, and Frankie grows suspicious of Sean.

episodes.name: No One's Coming
episodes.overview: Between Mike troubles, a Tru Air PR crisis and a birthday dinner with less-than-delightful in-laws, Kate’s plate is FULL. A misstep from Alice puts Anne’s book in jeopardy, while Jenny goes on the warpath for equal pay.

episodes.name: To Lure a Squirrel
episodes.overview: Kate and Nathan struggle with their new living arrangement. Frankie and Juniper take their investigation of Sean too far. Anne looks at her relationship with Alice in a new light.

episodes.name: Lice
episodes.overview: A lice outbreak at camp becomes everyone's worst nightmare. Kate's interview soon proves somewhat uncomfortable. Anne quarantines her house while Frankie tries to sell a home under false pretences.

episodes.name: Bad Reputation
episodes.overview: Kate finds herself in the middle of a PR crisis for her new client Après; Anne is inspired by a new book idea; Frankie and Bianca discover the truth about Sean.

episodes.name: Charlie and the Weed Factory
episodes.overview: Kate desperately searches the brewery for Charlie while Frankie seizes an opportunity for vengeful justice; Jenny's employers see things her way; Anne and Lionel make a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: The Carlsons Move to Calgary
episodes.overview: The Carlsons make the move, but it's not exactly what Lionel promised. Alice meets a cute boy at her new school. Kate and the gang fly out for a visit, and they discover Anne has made some questionable new friends.

episodes.name: Mama Mia Meatboy
episodes.overview: Kate feels the pressure to land a major new client. Anne is torn between hanging on to her ambition and succumbing to the rhythm of life as a Cochrane mom. With Bianca away, Frankie buys Rhoda a strange new pet.

episodes.name: Pleasure Yourself
episodes.overview: Kate walks further into the lioness' den with Sloane. Anne starts her new job. Alice gets closer with her new boyfriend. Jenny discovers her secret office romance with MCP might not be exactly what she expected.

episodes.name: A Rat, Girl
episodes.overview: In a high-pressure moment, Kate pitches an idea that isn't hers to give. Anne's publication dreams may finally come true; a new opportunity leads Frankie to expand her business. Jenny confronts her man about what he really wants.

episodes.name: Mother Knows Breast
episodes.overview: A quick fix at work leaves Kate in the rat trap. Anne struggles to keep her temper in check as she promotes her book. Val learns her nest isn't as empty as she thought. Frankie realizes her new employees are a mixed bag.

episodes.name: Finger in the Butt
episodes.overview: Anne's explosive television debut puts Kate's loyalty to the test. Frankie falls into a funk after a disaster at work. Jenny realizes her feelings for MCP might run deeper than she thought.

episodes.name: Launch Pad to Trash Hole
episodes.overview: After a wake-up call from Sloane, Kate adjusts her priorities. Frankie realizes she's responsible for a recent workplace tragedy. Needing a break from Kate, Anne hides out at Val's.

episodes.name: Punch Dad
episodes.overview: Anne is blind-sided by a controversial viral video starring Lionel. Kate faces collateral damage from her indulgent behavior. Frankie goes on a mission to right her wrongs.

episodes.name: Blue Angel
episodes.overview: Kate starts to question Sloane's ethics. Anne enrolls Alice in a new school.

episodes.name: Fack
episodes.overview: To protect what matters most, Kate makes a dramatic sacrifice. Settling back into her life in Toronto, Anne learns the fate of her book. Jenny's lies catch up to her.

episodes.name: Kate Fosters
episodes.overview: Kate struggles with a major change in the Foster household. Superstar publishing executive Sloane follows through on her promise to make Kate’s life at work a living hell. On the bright side,

episodes.name: Warm Lunch
episodes.overview: Suspicious of Nathan Jr.'s behavior, Kate looks to Anne for advice, but the guidance she needs come from a surprising source. A promising book proposal reunites rivals Kate and Sloane.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Goldie
episodes.overview: Jenny and MCP face the consequences of mixing business with pleasure. Kate makes a tough choice at work after a surprising discovery. And in Cochrane, there’s a bumpy legal road ahead for Lionel.

episodes.name: The Big One
episodes.overview: Val invites the gal pals to her birthday… Well, she invites them to plan her birthday. A conflict between our ladies at the party causes the day to go off the rails until Sloane turns things around.

episodes.name: Jazz Addict
episodes.overview: Kate urges Nathan Jr. to loosen up and discover his wild side. MCP tries to solve problems the quick way, but Jenny isn’t willing to cut corners. Anne struggles to keep her trademark anger in check.

episodes.name: Oh. Ohh. Ohhh.
episodes.overview: Kate plays detective after finding a mysterious phone number in Nathan’s pocket. Anne’s explosive personality lands her in Anger Management. And Sloane’s ultrasound appointment goes a little too well.

episodes.name: Goin' Fishin
episodes.overview: Kate helps Nathan build a connection with Nathan Jr. Anne joins Lionel in Cochrane to support his big day in court. Jenny feels edged out of her own wedding planning while Sloane’s love life heats up.

episodes.name: Poke The Bear
episodes.overview: A surprise move from Goldie sends Kate and Sloane’s joint project into a tailspin. Upon returning from Cochrane, tensions between Lionel and Anne are higher than ever.

episodes.name: Buried
episodes.overview: Kate discovers Charlie has an imaginary friend, while her business is under fire. The Carlsons reluctantly host a guest from Cochrane. A stubborn Jenny comes to terms with painful realities.

episodes.name: Bachelorette, But Make it Spooky
episodes.overview: It's Jenny's bachelorette party, and Val booked a haunted house; when a storm and an unwanted visitor pose a real threat, the ladies must band together if they want to survive the night.

episodes.name: The Break
episodes.overview: After a push from Anne, Kate doubles down on micromanaging things at work. Her hands-on approach comes under fire.

episodes.name: The Scary Things
episodes.overview: Kate may never ‘have it all,’ but she’s finally closer to finding a balance. Anne has a breakthrough at anger management. And Nathan Jr. makes a big decision.

episodes.name: Grow If You Want
episodes.overview: Kate may never ‘have it all,’ but she’s finally closer to finding a balance. Anne has a breakthrough at anger management. And Nathan Jr. makes a big decision.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Kate grapples with the unexpected addition to the Foster family, as a snag threatens to unravel everything she’s built at work. Anne finds out that you can move the girl back to the city, but her small town problems can’t be left behind. Jenny comes to realize that interoffice relationships might be a little messier than expected. Powerhouse Sloane is back again, and killing it in the boardroom, but maybe there’s more room in her schedule for a personal life than she thought. Val’s considering real change for the first time in a long time.

episodes.name: Ohmygodohmygodohmygod
episodes.overview: Kate is pushed out of her comfort zone by developments at work; Sloane doubles down as the hardest working executive with a baby; Anne bounces back from her attack better than ever.

episodes.name: A Hoot and a Scream
episodes.overview: Kate struggles to market a game-changing yet controversial pill, as Sloane's strategy puts her at odds with an author; while Jenny meets a dead-end, Anne meets a new friend in Anger Management.

episodes.name: I Got This
episodes.overview: On her first day away from baby, Sloane's maternal anxieties seep into the workplace. A disastrous commercial shoot brings Kate closer to her new client, as Anne goes on a risky field trip with hers.

episodes.name: Funny Business
episodes.overview: In an act of desperation, Jenny brings Zoe to visit a daunting figure from her past. Kate tries to revive her sex life and makes a pact with an amped-up Anne.

episodes.name: The Sterilizer
episodes.overview: Kate spins a PR crisis using Nathan's recent guilty pleasure. Anne and Lionel grow suspicious of Alice's involvement in a club; Val helps Sloane find community of her own.

episodes.name: It's Five O'Clock Somewhere
episodes.overview: Kate joins Ram out of office to brainstorm. Sloane catches her new friend in a lie. Jenny joins a surprising self-defence class. Anne resolves to foil Alice’s plan… if she can get home in time.

episodes.name: It's All Gone
episodes.overview: When they wake up at Kate’s office the morning after a night no-one can remember, the ladies must piece together exactly how a celebration for Alice could have gone so horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Fast and Soft
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Alice’s party, Kate does her due diligence to make things right, Sloane urges Paul to heat things up, and Anne calls in the big guns to scare Alice straight.

episodes.name: Old Sloane
episodes.overview: Kate is torn when she receives conflicting information about her client as she’s also roped into a group project with Jenny. Meanwhile, Anne guides Sloane on a mission to rediscover their old selves.

episodes.name: The Proposal
episodes.overview: The gang's surprise for Val is derailed when she runs into her ex. In the chaos, Sloane sees a new side of Paul, Anne puts Alice in the hot seat, and Kate goes above and beyond for her client.

episodes.name: Two Steve Jobs
episodes.overview: Kate puts the business first as things get personal at a high stakes conference; Anne's trust issues take over when Alice wants to go abroad; Sloane finally unbottles her emotions.

episodes.name: Fun Fair
episodes.overview: A Jenny-organized school fun fair brings everybody together for a day of festivities and life-changing decisions.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Kate searches for the magic; Anne learns to let go; Sloane honors her priorities; Jenny course corrects; Val makes amends.
